title: How do you manage pests and diseases in strawberries? This is what you need to do!

tasks.task: Manage pests and diseases organically on a strawberry farm.
subtasks: Adapt irrigation methods to prevent leaf spots.
Manage leaf spots through pruning and disposal.
Use biological control for red spider mites.
Prevent anthracnose and botrytis on fruits.
Protect fruits from birds using netting.

tasks.task: Learn about setting up a strawberry farm.
subtasks: Understand the cost of setting up a strawberry farm.
